subsection_content: Proteinuria is a very dangerous condition, which can be an early sign of chronic kidney disease (a condition of gradual loss of kidney function, requiring kidney replacement, kidney transplant or dialysis). Proteinuria also increases the risk of death from cardiovascular disease. (4)
subsection_data:
protein nieu.json. Is proteinuria dangerous?
Proteinuria is a very dangerous condition, which can be an early sign of chronic kidney disease (a condition of gradual loss of kidney function, requiring kidney replacement, kidney transplant or dialysis). Proteinuria also increases the risk of death from cardiovascular disease. (4)
